description:
Isshiki finally appears in his true form and goes to attack the Hidden Leaf Village in order to capture Kawaki, who will become his new vessel. Naruto and Sasuke, the only ones who are able to take on the superhuman Otsutsuki Clan, begin preparations. Boruto can`t stay idle and wants to fight alongside Naruto and Sasuke. However, he’s anxious about his Karma, worrying about what will happen if Momoshiki takes over his consciousness once more.
Source: crunchyroll
